title: T205 BroadLeaf Phelps SGC 40 VG, $495 or OFFER
author: mintacular

posts.post_title: T205 BroadLeaf Phelps SGC 40 VG, $495 or OFFER
posts.post_content:
Thank you to the board member who sold this to me a year or so ago. I enjoyed owning it but would like to raise some cash for a new house I am purchasing. Offering it here for $475 + $20 priority insured = $495  dlvd.

This card has good eye appeal for its grade (nicely centered, not too worn out looking, etc.)

[url][IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/nollpm/pre-war/5157/t205-phelps[/IMG][/url]

[url][IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/nollpm/pre-war/5158/t205-phelps-back[/IMG][/url]

 Thanks! -Pat
Accepting any reasonable offers, would like to sell card soon, just shoot me the # you are comfortable with and we'll go from there...
